articles.title: About
articles.contents:
My name is Sean Lopp. I post about a wide range of topics including: data science, open source software, product management, and bikes.
I currently lead product teams at RStudio, a B corporation that supports open source software for data science. I was previously an ML engineer, a sales rep, and a data scientist at NREL. I studied applied math at the Colorado School of Mines.
While the posts in this blog are my own, I’ve also written for RStudio, NREL, and Mines. You can view my research profile here where I’ve accidentally gotten an h-index of 4! I’ve also written extensively about environment management in R.
If you are looking for videos or pretty versions of talks, those live here.
